data.title: British Actor Bob Hoskins Dies Aged 71
data.meta_description: The 71-year-old passed away on Tuesday night with his family by his side following a bout of pneumonia.
data.text:
The 71-year-old passed away on Tuesday night with his family by his side following a bout of pneumonia.

In a statement, his wife Linda and children Rosa, Alex, Jack and Sarah said: “We are devastated by the loss of our beloved Bob.

“Thank you for your messages of love and support.”

Hoskins won several awards for his work, most notably crime drama Mona Lisa, for which he received a BAFTA and a Golden Globe, as well as a best supporting actor Oscar nomination.

In 2012, after being diagnosed with Parkinson’s disease, he retired from acting.

Image via Getty

Editor

TNT Magazine has been guiding independent travellers around the world for 35 years. Originally founded in 1983, TNT Magazine has been regarded by many as the youth travellers bible, offering a mix of inspiring travel content, news, lifestyle, fashion, jobs and accommodation. Our mantra is live life & travel which encompasses what we are all about. To live life to the full, and help young adults navigate the tribulations of working, living and experiencing adventure through travel. We have developed a great reputation throughout the world as an independent and trusted source of quality content and advice.
